exercises.name: High Standing Crunch
exercises.description: Using high suspended bands from standing position, back to the wall, bring your rigcage down, incidentally pulling the bands down

exercises.name: Curl to Front Squat
exercises.description: Standing up straight with arms at sides, holding bands. Hook bands on feet. Perform a dumbell curl and squat down, keeping back straight.

exercises.name: High Downward Oblique Swing
exercises.description: Using high suspended bands from standing position, rotate body while pulling bands across. Should result in a full 180 rotation. Switch between sets

exercises.name: Middle Pallof Press
exercises.description: Using middle suspended bands, standing with arms out, grab both band handholds and push out at an angle. Band should never be slack. Switch sides between sets

exercises.name: Middle 180 Twists
exercises.description: Using middle suspended bands, standing with arms in front, grab both band handholds with both hands and make a large combined fist. Rotate your midsection from 90 degrees right to 90 degress left, and back. Arms should remain straight in front

exercises.name: Low Downward Oblique Swing
exercises.description: Using low suspended bands from standing position, with fists together, rotate body while pulling bands across and up your body. Arms should remain straight. Switch between sets

exercises.name: Low Deadbug Dual Knee Ins
exercises.description: Lying down with your legs opposite bands and hands above your body gripping low suspended bands, bring knees up to your chest and back to lying down position

exercises.name: Hex Squats
exercises.description: Standing up straight with arms at sides. Hook bands on feet. Bend knees to chair position and back.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.description: Standing up straight with arms at sides. Hook bands on feet. Bend and touch your toes. Keep back straight and head up.

exercises.name: Glute Kickbacks
exercises.description: Down on all fours. Grab band with one hand, attach band to corresponding foot. Kick back with banded foot. Alternate between sets

exercises.name: Lying Leg Extensions
exercises.description: Laying down, hook both bands to your feet. Lay the band under you and grab it. Take your legs and send them vertical, making an L.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.description: Laying down, holding bands in your hands, tight over your chest. Bring torso up.

exercises.name: Hip Abductors
exercises.description: Standing up, with one band hooked on your leg and the other under your other foot. Extend leg out to the side. Alternate between sets

exercises.name: Lunge with Band
exercises.description: One leg in front, one back. Band in both hands, looped on your front leg. Lunge down and back up. Alternate legs

exercises.name: Seated Rows
exercises.description: Sit down with legs out. Hook bands on feet. Pull bands back to waist with rowing motion.

exercises.name: Seated Wide Rows
exercises.description: Sit down with legs out. Hook bands on feet. Pull to upper chest with rowing motion.

exercises.name: High to Low Rows
exercises.description: Get down on one knee, grasp high suspended bands. Pull down to upper chest with rowing motion.

exercises.name: Alt Low Crossover
exercises.description: Standing with arms down at your sides. Hook bands on one or more feet. Perform dumbbell curl across body.

exercises.name: Pull Aparts
exercises.description: Standing with arms out, level with shoulders. Pull to t-pose. Band should never be slack.

exercises.name: High Crossover
exercises.description: Standing with arms in front. Hook bands on one or more feet. Pull up to shoulder height with straight arms in front

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Standing with arms at your sides. Hook bands on one or more feet. Perform Dumbbell curls.

exercises.name: Shoulder Lat Raise
exercises.description: Standing with arms down at sides. Pull up to t-pose.

exercises.name: Side Bends
exercises.description: Standing with arms down at sides. lay band under both feet, hold one end of the band. perform a side bend, with the resting position providing tension to the band

exercises.name: Overhead Triceps Extension
exercises.description: Standing with arms above. Hook bands on back foot, behind body. Pull up arms so they are straight.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.description: Standing with arms up in front of your chest. Hook band on foot. Pull up to mostly straight arms, with elbows in front.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Standing with arms up along-side your chest. Hook band on foot. Pull up to mostly straight arms, with elbows in alongside.

exercises.name: Push Ups
exercises.description: On all fours, push up and down.

exercises.name: Spiderman Crunches
exercises.description: On all fours, activate your core and move one leg up to your chest. alternate legs within each set.
